compiler.title: canAda
compiler.subtitle: Java Compiler for the Ada Language
compiler.description: Writing an Ada compiler in a team of 4. Complete writing of the grammar, lexical, syntactic, and semantic analysis to translation into 32-bit ARM assembly code.

route-planner.title: Electric Car Route Planner
route-planner.subtitle: Algorithm and Data Structure Project
route-planner.description: Route planning for electric cars. Team project aimed at planning an optimized route that takes into account battery charge and charging points. Simulation of the congestion of the charging network.

english-invader.title: English Invader
english-invader.description: Video game to learn English based on the principle of the Space Invader game. Team project of 2. The technologies for this project were free to choose, so I used it to learn React and Node.js self-taught.

direct-dealing.title: Direct Dealing
direct-dealing.description: Software for selling goods and services between individuals. This project was carried out in a team of 4 as part of a school challenge over a week.

aoc-2023.title: Advent of Code 2023
aoc-2023.description: Participation in the Advent of Code 2023. 25-day programming challenge with increasingly difficult problems. I used this challenge to learn the Go language. Number of challenges completed: 13/25.

shared-garden.title: Shared Garden
shared-garden.description: Website for sharing gardens between individuals. Team project of 3. Development in Python with the Flask framework.

smart-greenhouse.title: Smart Greenhouse
smart-greenhouse.description: Modeling of a smart greenhouse, creating an architectural model. Using OpenHab for managing the greenhouse, sensors, and actuators.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Website showcasing my projects. Personal project. Development in React.
